description: Combining technical wicking fabric, built-in odor control, on-bike fit and a casual, easy-wearing aesthetic, the Capilene® Cool Trail Bike Henley is as perfect for post-ride socializing as it is for the trail. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Trail Bike Henley - Mens

specs.value: Moisture-wicking, fast-drying fabric features HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control
Articulated seams and longer back hem contour to body posture on bike
Small woven label at bottom hem

specs.key: Supporting the People Who Made This Product
